description: '''Bryan Kearney''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|k|ɑːr|n|i}}) is an Irish DJ/producer in [[electronic dance music]], mostly in trance, particularly [[uplifting trance]] and [[tech trance]]. His tracks have been remixed by the likes of [[Giuseppe Ottaviani]], [[John Askew (musician)|John Askew]], Activa, and [[Heatbeat]].
